GURMUKHI: mwlIgauVw mhlw 5 ]

GURMUKHI: kaunu jwnY cilq qyry; ikCu AMqu nwhI pwr ]1] rhwau ]

PRONUNCIATION: cil-q: polw bolo imlvW, l`ly ishwrI lwau

GURMUKHI: jyq kIn aupwrjnw; pRBu dwnu dyie. dwqwr ]1]

GURMUKHI: hir srin AwieE dwsu qyrw; pRB aUc Agm murwr ]

GURMUKHI: kiF lyhu Baujl ibKm qy; jnu nwnku sd bilhwr ]2]2]7]

GURMUKHI: mwlIgauVw mhlw 5 ]

GURMUKHI: dIn bWDv Bgiq vCl; sdw sdw ikRpwl ]1] rhwau ]

GURMUKHI: Awid AMqy miD qUhY; pRB ibnw. nwhI koie ]

GURMUKHI: bilhwir jwey sdw nwnku; dyhu Apxw nwau ]2]3]8]6]14]
